description: This file defines the application routing configuration for a Flutter app using the go_router package. It sets up route paths, associated screens, and redirect logic based on authentication state.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A utility class that creates and manages the application's routing logic, including route definitions and redirect behavior based on authentication state.

methods.name: createRouter
methods.description: Creates an instance of GoRouter with predefined routes and redirect logic based on user authentication status.
